data.name: Magitek VR
data.description:
Master Fire, Water, Earth, and Air

Magitek is a journey into the realm of elemental magic. With over 30 unique spells in 4 elements, your skills grow by practicing each class. Each class of magic operates by technique, flowing movement for water magic or strong stiff movements for earth.

MASTER THE ELEMENTS
FIRE - Sharp and Intense movements create the Fire spells! From small fireballs to a scorching Inferno, and even flying with flame thrusters!

WATER - Smooth, Flowing motion will master Water spells! Flood your opponent with water whips or freeze your enemy with petrifying Ice spells!

EARTH - Strong & rigid actions give earth spells their strength! Hurl boulders, Summon Rock armour, or erupt chunks of earth from the ground!

AIR - Breezy, Effortless movements produce Air magic. Don't be fooled, air is powerful in a masterâ€™s arsenal, allowing you to dodge and fly around, as well as cut with powerful air-blades.

GAMEMODES
ARENA: Engage in battles against waves of foes & climb the leaderboards. 

OPEN WORLD STORY: an epic adventure in the world of Embra, where Dungeons, enemy encounters, the mysteries of Magitek await. 

SANDBOX: Our sandbox mode provides the perfect playground for experimentation. Practice  your spells and test the systems of Magitek.

MORE FEATURES:
- Grass burns, ice melts, water freezes and iron heats up
- Physics-Based Enemies react to spells with physics 
- Weapons and Items infused with elemental magic
